snippet: Because it sought to delay the championship, fearing a spread of Ebola, Morocco was barred from the 2015 Cup, another disruption to soccer related to the outbreak.
abstract: Confederation of African Football removes Morocco as host of 2015 Africa Cup of Nations soccer tournament, and expels it from participating in biennial championship after Moroccan officials sought to delay event for six months or a year due to concerns about spread of Ebola.
lead_paragraph: Because it sought to delay the championship, fearing a spread of Ebola, Morocco was barred from the 2015 Cup, another disruption to soccer related to the outbreak.

headline.main: Africa Cup Disrupted by Ebola Concerns
headline.print_headline: Africa Cup Disrupted by Ebola Concerns
